itemListElement.name: Potato Quinoa Patties with Chickpea curry. Tikki Chole. Vegan Recipe

@graph.name: Potato Quinoa Patties with Chickpea curry. Tikki Chole. Vegan Recipe
@graph.description: These potato quinoa patties have simple ingredients and spices & go very well with a sweet and spicy chickpea curry. Tikki Chole. Vegan, Soy-free easily gluten-free Recipe
recipeIngredient: 1/3  medium onion (red or white finely chopped)
1/2 teaspoon carom seeds (Ajwain, or use cumin)
1 slice of stale bread (crumbled (omit to make gluten-free or use coarsely ground Oats))
1  Recipe chickpea curry (or Sweet and Sour Chickpeas )
Top with Tamarind Date Chutney  (or BBQ sauce)
Use spice blends like garam masala, berbere, cajun spice in the patties

recipeInstructions.text: In a large bowl, mash the potatoes well.
recipeInstructions.name: In a large bowl, mash the potatoes well.

recipeInstructions.text: Add the rest of the ingredients, mix well.
recipeInstructions.name: Add the rest of the ingredients, mix well.

recipeInstructions.text: Shape into patties and pan fry them with a little oil on medium heat until both sides are golden and crisp.
recipeInstructions.name: Shape into patties and pan fry them with a little oil on medium heat until both sides are golden and crisp.

recipeInstructions.text: Patties can be served as is with sauce of choice like ketchup, Sriracha or BBQ.
recipeInstructions.name: Patties can be served as is with sauce of choice like ketchup, Sriracha or BBQ.

recipeInstructions.text: To serve Tikki chole, ladle some chickpea curry below or on top of the patties.
recipeInstructions.name: To serve Tikki chole, ladle some chickpea curry below or on top of the patties.

recipeInstructions.text: Top them with chopped onion and cilantro.
recipeInstructions.name: Top them with chopped onion and cilantro.

recipeInstructions.text: For variation, top with Tamarind date chutney or a little Barbecue sauce.
recipeInstructions.name: For variation, top with Tamarind date chutney or a little Barbecue sauce.
